RScript.Name: Impute Slaughtered
RScript.Description:
Impute values for animals slaughtered in the animal commodity, using information from the corresponding meat. Note: this module runs on all countries!
Tests: - When transfering animal numbers to the slaughtered animal in meat, no missing values are transfered. - The slaughtered animal, carcass weight and meat production should be either all missing, or all imputed for each time series.
